Leave Policy:

Employees are entitled to the following leaves per year:
- 12 Casual Leaves
- 12 Sick Leaves
- 20 Earned Leaves

Leaves must be applied via the HR portal. Unused leaves can be carried forward for up to one year.

Reimbursement Policy:

Employees can claim travel, meals, and lodging during official business trips. Claims must be submitted within 10 days of the trip.
